$15 Starbucks Gift Card will be mailed to you upon redemption.

SPECIFICATIONS

$15 Starbucks credit. (SGD currency)

Available to be use at any Starbucks retail store in Singapore.

Gift card design selection is not available at this current moment.

Actual gift card design may vary.

TERMS AND CONDITIONS

About Your Account; Starbucks Purchases Only

The Starbucks Card is issued to you by Starbucks. It allows you to load a monetary value on to your Starbucks Card for future purchases at participating Starbucks stores. The Starbucks Card is to be treated like cash. It cannot be replaced if lost, stolen or destroyed unless you have registered it and reported the loss as described below. The monetary value that you load onto your Starbucks Card is a pre-payment only for the goods and services of participating Starbucks stores. No credit card, credit line, overdraft protection or deposit account is associated with a Starbucks Card. No interest, dividends or any other earnings on funds loaded on to a Starbucks Card will accrue or be paid or credited to you by Starbucks. The value associated with the Starbucks Card is not insured or guaranteed by any person or entity.

Your Starbucks Card is valid for use in participating Starbucks stores in Singapore only. We reserve the right not to accept any Starbucks Card or otherwise limit use of a Starbucks Card if we reasonably believe that the use is unauthorised, fraudulent or otherwise unlawful.

Fees and Expiry of Starbucks Card

Starbucks does not charge any fees for the issuance, activation, use or reloading of your Starbucks Card unless otherwise stated. Your Starbucks Card will expire three years after the last date of transaction.

Your Starbucks Card will expire three years after the last date of transaction. Any remaining balance in such an expired Starbucks Card will be cancelled immediately and without further notice. For the avoidance of doubt, notwithstanding anything to the contrary in this agreement, any such remaining balance shall be non-refundable.

Shuga Pte Ltd is not affiliated with Starbucks. Above Terms and Conditions are referenced from http://www.starbucks.com.sg/terms-of-use/starbucks-card for your convenience.
